title: Gemma Collins had to turn down X Factor: Celebrity because of her big record deal
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Gemma Collins was forced to turn The X Factor: Celebrity away.

The GC, 38, insisted she had to refuse the once-in-a-lifetime offer because she has a big record deal with Universal.

Teasing it, Gemma unveiled she has been working with producer Naughty Boy as she makes her name on the music scene.

The former TOWIE star is no stranger to the music world and she previously recorded song The GC for her new show Diva Forever.

Scottish singer Tallia Storm sang the lyrics which she co-wrote with Gemma.

(Image: Gemma Collins/Instagram)

Gemma said of the new opportunity to Closer magazine : "I was asked to do The X Factor: Celebrity but had to turn it down because of my record deal with Universal.

"I've been working on new music with producer Naughty Boy - he's recorded with Beyonce and Zayn Malik.

"He comes to my house and brings me a curry. He's so down to earth."

(Image: Gemma Collins/Instagram)

The Mirror approached Gemma Collins' representatives for further comment.

Gemma would be in good company of the hottest reality stars in the business on the new series.

A whole slew of celebrities have taken to the stage for The X Factor : Celebrity to showcase their vocal talents.

Love Island's Wes Nelson , Zara McDermott , Samira Mighty and Eyal Booker have teamed together to form a band on the show.

Megan McKenna, of TOWIE fame, has also graced the stage as she comes face-to-face with Simon Cowell once again after a string of historic singing auditions.

The X Factor: Celebrity is Simon's pet project to give the original show a face lift for the year.
description: The GC is no stranger to the music world and she previously recorded a song for her new show Diva Forever
